org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.server

Class JournalMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.server.JournalMetrics

  • @Metrics(about="Journal metrics",
         context="dfs")
 class JournalMetrics
extends Object
    The server-side metrics for a journal from the JournalNode's perspective.
